evidence.claim: Benchmark Solutions utilizes AWS for cloud computing infrastructure, enhancing scalability and reliability.
The company implements FHIR standards for data interoperability in health applications.
X12 EDI transaction sets, especially 834 and 835, are utilized for managing healthcare enrollment and payments.
They adopt event-driven architecture for improved integration between various health services.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 formats and APIs for healthcare data exchange, fitting clearinghouse profile.
